sources.title: Safety Spin (1953)
sources.description: The near-sighted Mr. Magoo decides it is time for him to renew his drivers' license. Trust to form, he heads for the motor vehicle bureau but winds up at a maternity hospital. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/safety-spin-1953/

metadata.Plot: The near-sighted Mr. Magoo (voice of Jim Backus) decides it is time for him to renew his drivers' license. Trust to form, he heads for the motor vehicle bureau but winds up at a maternity hospital.
metadata.Actors: Jim Backus, Colleen Collins, Peter Leeds
